problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of the semicircle, and AB = N_0, the semicircle rotates clockwise around point B by N_1, and point A rotates to the position of A′, then the area of ​​the shaded part in the figure is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵S_{阴影}=S~扇形ABA′~+S~半圆~-S~半圆~=S~扇形ABA′~=\frac{45\cdotπ\cdot4^{2}}{360}=2π．故选:B．
